metadata.title: CVE-2024-2199 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A denial of service vulnerability was found in 389-ds-base ldap server.This issue may allow an authenticated user to cause a server crash whilemodifying `userPassword` using malformed input.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
